mapper.select: SELECT SGROUP_ID, SGROUP_NAME, SGROUP_IMG_PATH, SGROUP_IMG_NAME FROM SGROUP WHERE SGROUP_ID IN (SELECT SGROUP_ID FROM SGROUP_MEMBER WHERE SGROUP_MEM_ID = #{memberId})

SELECT S.SGROUP_ID, S.SGROUP_NAME, S.SGROUP_OPEN, S.SGROUP_PWD, S.SGROUP_EXPLAIN, S.SGROUP_IMG_PATH, S.SGROUP_IMG_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, SGROUP.* FROM SGROUP WHERE SGROUP_OPEN = '0') S WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startRounum} AND #{endRounum}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM SGROUP ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 20
SELECT * FROM SGROUP WHERE SGROUP_NAME LIKE '%${findName}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO SGROUP VALUES (SEQ_SGROUP_ID.nextval, #{sgroupName}, #{sgroupOpen},#{sgroupPwd},#{sgroupEx},#{sgroupImgPath},#{sgroupImgName}) INTO SGROUP_MEMBER VALUES (SEQ_SGROUP_ID.nextval, #{sgroupWriter}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select: select s.sgroup_mem_id AS "MEM_ID" , NVL( SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(v.difftime , 'HH24:MI:SS'), 12, 8), '0') AS "SUM_MIN" from sgroup_member s left join v_record_week v on( v.record_mem_id = s.sgroup_mem_id ) where s.sgroup_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY SUM_MIN DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE SGROUP SET SGROUP_NAME = #{sgroupName}, SGROUP_OPEN = #{sgroupOpen}, SGROUP_PWD = #{sgroupPwd}, SGROUP_EXPLAIN = #{sgroupEx}, SGROUP_IMG_PATH = #{sgroupImgPath}, SGROUP_IMG_NAME= #{sgroupImgName} WHERE SGROUP_ID = #{sgroupId}
mapper.select: SELECT '그룹원' MEM_ID, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 0, 'DY') AS "D1" , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 6, 'DY') AS "D2", TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 5, 'DY') AS "D3", TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 4, 'DY') AS "D4" , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 3, 'DY') AS "D5", TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 2, 'DY') AS "D6", TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'DY') AS "D7" FROM DUAL UNION SELECT SGROUP_MEM_ID, NVL(SUBSTR((SELECT DIFFTIME FROM V_RECORD_WO_SUBJECT_W_GROUP b WHERE TRUNC(RECORD_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE - 0 ) AND b.SGROUP_MEM_ID = A.SGROUP_MEM_ID AND SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID ) , 12, 8), '0' ) AS "D1" ,NVL(SUBSTR((SELECT DIFFTIME FROM V_RECORD_WO_SUBJECT_W_GROUP WHERE TRUNC(RECORD_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE - 6) AND SGROUP_MEM_ID = A.SGROUP_MEM_ID AND SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID ) , 12, 8), '0') AS "D2", NVL(SUBSTR((SELECT DIFFTIME FROM V_RECORD_WO_SUBJECT_W_GROUP WHERE TRUNC(RECORD_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE - 5) AND SGROUP_MEM_ID = A.SGROUP_MEM_ID AND SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID ) , 12, 8), '0') AS "D3", NVL(SUBSTR((SELECT DIFFTIME FROM V_RECORD_WO_SUBJECT_W_GROUP WHERE TRUNC(RECORD_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE - 4) AND SGROUP_MEM_ID = A.SGROUP_MEM_ID AND SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID ) , 12, 8), '0') AS "D4", NVL(SUBSTR((SELECT DIFFTIME FROM V_RECORD_WO_SUBJECT_W_GROUP WHERE TRUNC(RECORD_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE - 3) AND SGROUP_MEM_ID = A.SGROUP_MEM_ID AND SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID ) , 12, 8), '0') AS "D5", NVL(SUBSTR((SELECT DIFFTIME FROM V_RECORD_WO_SUBJECT_W_GROUP WHERE TRUNC(RECORD_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE - 2) AND SGROUP_MEM_ID = A.SGROUP_MEM_ID AND SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID ) , 12, 8), '0') AS "D6", NVL(SUBSTR((SELECT DIFFTIME FROM V_RECORD_WO_SUBJECT_W_GROUP WHERE TRUNC(RECORD_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE - 1) AND SGROUP_MEM_ID = A.SGROUP_MEM_ID AND SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID ) , 12, 8), '0') AS "D7" FROM V_RECORD_WO_SUBJECT_W_GROUP A WHERE A.SGROUP_ID = #{groupId}
